title: What do the yellow and black wires in a home telephone jack do?
itunes:title: What do the yellow and black wires in a home telephone jack do?
description:
It only takes two wires to connect a phone, but most house wiring contains four wires. Check out this HowStuffWorks podcast to learn why.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
